title: Steamed Vegies With Mushrooms
directions: Boil kettle, pour into saucepan, put vegies in steamer, and steam for 10 minutes or a bit less if you like them slightly crunchy.
place a tablespoon of butter in seperate saucepan and let melt, add chopped mushrooms and garlic, i use 3 cloves but this might be too strong for some people, and stir for 5 minutes.
serve together in a bowl and add a spoonful of the mustard and mix through.
ingredients: Whatever vegetables you like to have steamed eg.
